alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 7:40PM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Locally higher gusts up to 60 mph expected on the south side of Casper along Highway 258. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
